title: FS: T206 Nap Lajoie (with bat) Tolstoi SGC 70, extremely scarce
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Nap Lajoie (with bat) Tolstoi SGC 70, extremely scarce
posts.post_content:
Card is perfectly centered and remarkable. The last two PSA 5's with common backs have gone for $700++. This card is a 5.5, with an extremely difficult back. Very tough front/back combo. I also have these other HOFer Tolstoi's if interested....Price reduced to $1400, thanks. **SOLD**

SGC 82 Walter Johnson (hands at chest)...**SOLD**
SGC 82 Mordecai Brown (Chicago shirt)
SGC 70 Zack Wheat
Available..Fantastic front/back combo with a tough HOFer....
You mention a few cards in this post... Are they still for sale?
Tim, two available (Wheat and Mordecai Brown). I updated the thread....thanks
